fulltext:
TRUNG DO THANH
SENIOR SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
Address
229/50 Tan Ky Tan Quy street, Tan Son 
Nhi ward, Tan Phu district, Ho Chi Minh 
city.
Contact
trungtayninh@gmail.com
+84 937 322 607
WORK EXPERIENCE
Data Entry
Senior Software Developer,  Feb 2017 - Now  (12 members)
    The Data entry application allows users input paper data to digital 
data. That will help company easy controls the information. Widget 
approaching that is flexible for user interface.
    Technologies: Angular 6; ReactJs; VueJs, Store Management 
(Redux); Web API; Bootstrap; SQL Server 2016; Elastic Search.
Project Direct-Hit & Direct-Shop at Identifix
Senior .Net Developer, Apr 2015 - Jan 2017 (20 members)
    Direct-Hit delivers all data, tools and information necessary to help 
automotive repair professionals run their shops as efficiently, 
accurately and profitably as possible, by allowing them to save shop 
time–every day and on every car. 
    Direct-Shop offers small and mid-sized repair shops a solution for 
managing core business processes. Based in the cloud, Direct-Shop 
can be deployed quickly and provides a streamlined set of services so 
you aren’t paying for extra features that you don’t need or won’t use.
    Technologies: .Net Core; MS SQL 2008; Node JS; Angular 1.2;  
Splunk; JQuery; Bootstrap; Bitbucket; Karma; NUnit; Jira.
http://www.identifix.com
PROFILE SUMMARY - OBJECTIVE
    Software Development professional with more than 10 years 
experience programming in .Net. Highly skilled in specifications 
gathering, troubleshooting, and quality assurance testing using .NET,  
and more than 5 years in Single Page Application.
    An organized, detail-oriented, and conscientious self-starter, able 
to strategize and prioritize effectively to accomplish multiple tasks 
and stay calm under pressure. Highly organized and independent; 
able to effectively coordinate tasks to accomplish projects with 
timeliness and creativity.
    Decisive, efficient team approach; outstanding communication 
skills. Strong planning and facilitation skills; able to communicate 
effectively with all organizational levels, build relationships of trust 
and enlist the participation of team members.
    With a good experience I will adapt in Software Development of 
productivity and successful project outcomes. We are together to 
develop much further.
Now | 2015
2015 | 2014
TECHNOLOGY SKILLS
ASP.Net Web Form/MVC
Window Form;WPF
MS SQL Server;NoSQL;Mongo
Web/Window Service;WCF
Micro Service
EF;NHibernate;Data Objects
.NetNuke;Umbraco;SharePoint
Angular;React;Vue;Node
Gulp;Webpack;NPM
Elastic Search;Splunk
Telerik;Bootstrap;Wijmo;JQuery
LocalDB(Intergration test)
NUnit Testing
Automation Testing
Karma;Jest;Mocha
SingalR;Firebase;Websocket
Autofac;Automapper
SVN;TFS;Bitbucket;SS;Git
LinQ;CAML...
Civica Housing Management
Senior .Net Developer,  July 2013 - Aug 2014 (50 members)
    A leading partner in social housing, Civica provides a flexible 
IT-based platform to help organizations deliver improved tenant 
services with greater efficiency.
    Technologies: Single page; ASP .Net MVC 4; MS SQL 2008; SignalR; 
SQL Dependcy; Autofact; Automapper; JQuery; KendoUI; Local DB; 
Fluent NHibernate; NUnit; Moq.
2014 | 2013
http://www.civica.co.uk/housing
2013 | 2009
SOFT SKILLS
Successful Negotiation
Time Management
Positive Thinking
Effective Training, Coaching
Effective Communication
Problem Resolving
Other Projects
.Net Developer,  Sep 2009 - June 2013
    - US GroupM Pitch Database report (2 months)
          https://apac-portal.insidegroupm.com/APTradingPitchDatabase/SitePages/Home.aspx
    - Harveynash Internal Tool Support (7 months)
    - Investment Management (14 months)
          http://kcn.binhduong.gov.vn            
    - FIA-Portal (4 months)
          http://fia.mpi.gov.vn
    - Human Resource Management of Government (6 months)
    - R1Concept (in Freelance) (5 months)
          http://www.r1concepts.com
    - 53 degrees Kurching (in Freelance) (3 months)
    - Sentosa (in Freelance) (6 months)
          http://www.sentosa.com.sg
    - Zignsec (in Freelance) (9 months)
          http://zignsec.com
* Technologies: ASP .Net WebFrom; DotNetNuke 4-5; Sharepoint 
2007-2010; Umbraco 7; AspDotNetStorefront 9; Stone Edge; MS SQL 
My Project Responsibility  
    It is ultimately my responsibility that all of the developers in my 
team are adhering to the software quality standards agreed by my 
team and the wider development team so that work is done to the 
highest possible quality.
    To act as example to all the developers on my team by advocating 
learning and taking the time to do so myself so that they feel 
comfortable.
EDUCATION
BACHELOR OF INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY
Van Lang University, 2005-2009
LANGUAGES
Vietnamese English Japanese
HOBBIES AND ACTIVITIES
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
